name: Goji OG
description: Goji OG is a sativa-dominant hybrid bred by Bodhi Seeds crossed between Nepali OG and Snow Lotus. The flavor is as unique as the berry it's named after, offering a dynamic aroma including red berry, black cherry, strawberry, hawaiian punch, and licorice. Indoor or outdoor grows offer high yields with a flowering time of around 9 weeks.
descriptionPlain: Goji OG is a sativa-dominant hybrid bred by Bodhi Seeds crossed between Nepali OG and Snow Lotus. The flavor is as unique as the berry it's named after, offering a dynamic aroma including red berry, black cherry, strawberry, hawaiian punch, and licorice. Indoor or outdoor grows offer high yields with a flowering time of around 9 weeks.
aka: Goji OG Kush, Goji, Gogi OG, Gogi

highlightedReviews.text:
Pro: Smooth to smoke but adds a little punch taste when you are done.  Very smokey, earthy and licorice taste.   First, the clarity.  I lost my lighter for 2 hours ... did the same steps 20 times, couldn't find it.   Smoked this stuff and within 15 seconds, did another look at how I was doing the steps and found the lighter, no lie - "Like of course it would be there".   

Let the feeding time begin - you'll be wanting to eat right away after smoking this.  Another time I was smoking this, I ended up baking chocolate chip cookies, and that's very productive for me!   

You will like dancing and moving around. You'll be so awake, you'll be creative, you'll be lovin life.  Listening to Dave Rawlings Machine.  This is probably the best day-time medicine you could get.

Con:  No side effects at all - but it's not long-lasting.  After 2-3 hours, it's like you didn't do much.

When: When some idiot wants to talk about Republican ideas and their candidates  

Warn:  When I smoke 1 or 2 - it's awesome.  When I do  like 4, it's a hard hard high - one that is too strong and I actually dislike it.  But, love it when I do 1 or 2 hits.    It does have some Indica in there so you are neither tired or awake - it's very in between - but not so much you want to sleep.

Wow 420710ryder from tha beast coast puffin tough gojiog holy moley lolo fuking stright gasssssssssss love tha unique taste and smooth n fruity taste its just banging ...props 207 finest beast coast 420710ryders all day everyday

articles.title: The Avid Dabber: Dabbing With a Nectar Collector
articles.author: Will Hyde
articles.text:
It‚Äôs been a busy week in Avid Dabber-land! Last week was a whirlwind of excessive coffee drinking, food truck gluttony, and rubbing elbows with some of the best growers and extractors from Oregon. I got to hang with a bunch of awesome people and enjoy some of Portland‚Äôs culinary scene, but most importantly, I got to experience some of the finest flower and hash available in the state.
Last time I shared some of the temperature ranges I prefer when dabbing. This week, I wanted to show a little love for my Nectar Collector. If you‚Äôve never seen or used a Nectar Collector, it is tool with an inventive approach to dabbing. I love the simplicity and portability, and how self-contained a Nectar Collector makes the dabbing experience. It‚Äôs always met with some degree of awe and wonder whenever I bust it out in front of someone who hasn‚Äôt had a chance to dab with one before.
Browse Dab & Oil Rigs





 How did you feel about dabs from the #nectarcollector? I love the simplicity, portability, and how contained it keeps the dabbing experience. üêùüçØ . . . #aviddabber #Seattle #leafly #onlydabthebest #onlythebest #onlysmokethebest #dab #dabs #cannabis #dabbing #dablife #dabstagram #shatter #dailydabbers #dabbersdaily #bho #sho #weshouldsmoke #highsociety #stayhigh #concentrates #710 #420 #710community
A post shared by  The Avid Dabber (@the.avid.dabber) on Feb 6, 2018 at 12:53pm PST



What Makes a Nectar Collector Different?
When I introduce someone to the Nectar Collector, there‚Äôs usually a moment of confusion as they try to figure out how this long, glass device is used. Simply put, it‚Äôs a ‚Äúpercolating dab straw.‚Äù Like a standard dab rig, Nectar Collectors are designed to vaporize hash and concentrates. They are portable and use a dish to help avoid some of the mess of tooling your dab when on the go. And of course, what‚Äôs a dab without proper percolation? A Nectar Collector offers water-filtration typical of the common dab rig, but in a spill-proof design.

How Does a Nectar Collector Work?
What makes the Nectar Collector‚Äôs functionality so unique is that instead of applying a dab to the surface of a nail or banger, you apply the hot tip to a small pile of hash in your dish.
To prepare your dab, you can load just about any amount of hash in the serving dish. When I take my Nectar Collector on camping trips, I‚Äôll drop the whole gram in the dish and have dabs on deck for the entire weekend.





 Starting my week off on the hot tip‚Ä¶ just like my #nectarcollector Hope everyone has a great week! . . . #aviddabber #Seattle #leafly #onlydabthebest #onlythebest #onlysmokethebest #dab #dabs #cannabis #dabbing #dablife #dabstagram #shatter #dailydabbers #dabbersdaily #bho #sho #weshouldsmoke #highsociety #stayhigh #concentrates #710 #420 #710community #glassofig üì∑ @juliasumpter
A post shared by  The Avid Dabber (@the.avid.dabber) on Jan 29, 2018 at 11:29am PST



With your hash is sitting in the serving dish,¬†heat the tip of the Nectar Collector just like you would with a standard nail or banger. With the tip of the Nectar Collector red hot, give it about a minute to cool down before you take your dab. Most Nectar Collectors will come with a quartz tip, a titanium tip, or both. I prefer the quartz tip, but the titanium tip offers more durability since it is less susceptible to breaking if it drops out.
Once the tip has cooled to your preferred temperature, tap the hot tip along your pile of concentrate sitting in the dish. Take note, the longer you hold the tip against the hash, the larger your dab will be. I‚Äôve found the best way to control the size of your dab is to repeatedly tap your Nectar Collector until you‚Äôve pulled enough vapor through.
From there, the vapor will travel up through the Nectar Collector, percolating through the water chamber until it meets you at the mouth piece. Exhale and enjoy!

Pros & Cons of Dabbing with a Nectar Collector





 Only two more days to get 20% off all old school & new school original Nectar Collectors!! To make a purchase go to our website NectarCollector.org! Again that's 20% off of everything!! üòÉ #justthetip #dipandsip #theoriginalverticalvaporizer #710 #glassforsale #420sale  Photo credit to @primalglass thanks for the awesome shot!
A post shared by  Nectar Collector (@nectarcollector710) on Apr 22, 2016 at 3:13pm PDT



Pros
Unique ‚Äì The novel design of a Nectar Collector is always sure to catch attention.
Design ‚Äì The spill-proof design makes travel easy, and the fact that you can take it apart makes cleaning simple.
Portable ‚Äì It‚Äôs easy to take with you and offers a mess-free dabbing experience on the go.
Self-contained ‚Äì No tools needed; just heat, dab, and enjoy.
Cons
Multiple components ‚Äì Thanks to gravity, the component pieces can detach and fall if not properly secured. Pro tip: You can use a keck clip to help keep your glass attachments secure.
Long and unwieldy ‚Äì The long shape can be a bit awkward and cumbersome, especially when passing around a Nectar Collector with a red-hot tip.
Lack of temperature control ‚Äì While you can find e-nail adapters and heater coils that work with a Nectar Collector, the traditional heat and cool method doesn‚Äôt offer the same standardization as a typical quartz banger. It will take some trail and error to find the sweet spot and manage the temperature fluctuation.
Explore Dabbing Tools & Accessories
Avid Dab of the Week





 Sunday morning dabs‚Ä¶ #goji flower rosin I pressed from @ftsfarms flower. A little on the hot side but still üëåüî•üíØüöÄ . . . #aviddabber #Seattle #leafly #onlydabthebest #onlythebest #onlysmokethebest #dab #dabs #cannabis #dabbing #dablife #dabstagram #shatter #dailydabbers #dabbersdaily #flowerrosin #rosin #sho #weshouldsmoke #highsociety #stayhigh #concentrates #710 #420 #710community
A post shared by  The Avid Dabber (@the.avid.dabber) on Jan 28, 2018 at 1:28pm PST



This week‚Äôs dab features some flower rosin I pressed myself from Goji OG grown by From The Soil in Elma, WA. After pressing and collecting the rosin, I left it to cure for 48 hours, allowing it to butter up into a creamy, opaque consistency. The flavor is a mix of earthy pine and subtle hints of berry sweetness on the exhale.
Have you dabbed with a Nectar Collector? Share your experiences in the comments section below or post them to Instagram and tag me (@the.avid.dabber) using¬†#aviddabber. Keep your nail hot and your eyes locked on Leafly for the next installment of The Avid Dabber. Until next week, ONLY DAB THE BEST!

articles.title: New Strains Alert: The 2015 Michigan Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Breeders and growers duked it out last weekend in Michigan for yet another High Times Cannabis Cup. The best of the best were pitted against each other, and we're curious how many of you have had the pleasure of trying these champs. Share your thoughts in a strain review or check out where to find these elite genetics at a shop near you by navigating to their strain page and clicking "Availability."
Without further ado, here are your 2015 winners!
¬†
CANNABIS FLOWER WINNERS

Best Indica Flower
1st Place: Zkittlez from 3rd Gen Family with Terphogz and The Union
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Greenwolf Oregon with G.C. Rebellion Farms
3rd Place: Deathwalker OG from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Lenz and Valerio
¬†
Best Sativa Flower
1st Place: Strawberry Banana from Mass Genetics
2nd Place: Tropicana from Cannabiotix
3rd Place: Dreamy Jones from Bud White at Interlochen Alternative Health
¬†
Best Hybrid Flower
1st Place: Sunshine #4 by Bodhi Seeds from The Green Room Detroit
2nd Place: Savant‚Äôs Grail from 710 Savant
3rd Place: Crown OG from Crown OG with A Detroit Alternative and Moxie 71
¬†
Best CBD Flower
1st Place: Perkins Cut Cannatonic from Mota Rebel Genetics
2nd Place: CBDee‚Äôs #1B from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Super Sonic CBD from Radicle Genetics in collaboration with Valerio
¬†
CANNABIS CONCENTRATE WINNERS

Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place: Faygo Red Pop Live Resin from 710 Savant
2nd Place: Grape Valley Kush Live Resin from PeaceOil
3rd Place: Moxie Goji Live Resin from A Detroit Alternative
¬†
Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place: Clementine Live Resin from Crockett Family Farms
2nd Place: Romulan Grenade‚Äôs Live Plant Run from LightSky Farms with NLG
3rd Place: Tangie Live Resin from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie Genetics
¬†
Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place: Strawberry Banana Lemonade from Greenwolf Oregon and Moxie 710
2nd Place: Strawberry Banana from Loud Pack Extracts Oregon with Moxie Mix
3rd Place: Crown OG from Moxie Genetics with ADA East
¬†
Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place: Goji Rosin from Moxie Seeds & Extracts with ADA East and Foundation Extracts
2nd Place: Moxie Solventless Goji 120-micron from A Detroit Alternative
3rd Place: 73-micron Bruce Banner #3 Freeze Dried Water Hash from Michigan Made Melts in collaboration with Kushmanjockin
¬†
Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place: CBD Cookies / Cannatonic / Cannasphere from Kannacare in collaboration with TerpTitan
2nd Place: CBDee‚Äôs #1B Live Plant Run from Pure West Compassion Club with LightSky Farms
3rd Place: Startonic Sap from Genotype A2 with A2 Wellness
¬†
CANNABIS PRODUCT WINNERS

Best Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Kief Krispy from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and Kief Krispy
2nd Place: Captain Kirk‚Äôs Truffle Tropicales from Captain Kirk Edibles of Ann Arbor Health Collective
3rd Place: Got Milk? From Mindright
¬†
Best CBD Cannabis Edible
1st Place: Special Fx Labs CBD Dark Chocolate Mint from Jackson County Compassion Center
2nd Place: Cherry Almond Sherbet Delight ‚Äì CBD Special from Arborside Delights
3rd Place: CBDee‚Äôs Strawberry Lemonade from LightSky Farms with NLG
¬†
Best Cannabis Topical
1st Place: PBO from PBOHeals.com
2nd Place: Budsuds Purple Chem Topical Soap Bar from Budsuds with R.I. Finest and The Cali Connection
3rd Place: Truu Hemp Infused Lotion from Mindright
¬†
Best Cannabis Product
1st Place: MOXIE | Moxie Mix
2nd Place: Raw Papers | HBI
3rd Place: Advanced Nutrients | Advanced Nutrients
¬†
Best Glass
1st Place: We Grow Michigan | Joe P x SD Ryno ‚ÄúDevil Duck Bot‚Äù
2nd Place: Sacred Expressions | The Collector
3rd Place: Nexus Glass | Tesla V3
¬†
Best Vaporizer
1st Place: Puff Co | Puff Co
2nd Place: VaporZ | VaporZ
3rd Place: WildBill‚Äôs Tobacco | Honey Pen
